subject: Re: [PATCHv6 02/17] mm: Change the interface of prep_compound_tail()

reviews.author: Kiryl Shutsemau (author)
reviews.summary: Reviewer Kiryl Shutsemau raised concerns about the patch series, specifically in patch [PATCHv6 08/17] mm: Make page_zonenum() use head page, questioning whether a check for compound_info_has_mask() is necessary and suggesting moving it to per-zone.

reviews.author: Muchun Song
reviews.summary: Muchun Song reviewed several patches in the series, providing Reviewed-by and Acked-by tags for patches 09/17, 11/17, and multiple instances of patch 08/17.

reviews.author: David (arm)
reviews.summary: Reviewer David raised minor nitpicks about indentation and naming consistency in the patch, but overall approved it (LGTM) and gave an Acked-by.

reviews.author: Usama Arif
reviews.summary: Usama Arif raised concerns about the patch not working for ARM due to undefined behavior when calculating order using ilog2, suggesting alternative calculation methods.

reviews.author: Vlastimil Babka
reviews.summary: Vlastimil Babka expressed concerns about the patch series, specifically mentioning that he is not thrilled by the change in page_zonenum() and would prefer to have shared tail pages per node+zone instead of just per node.

reviews.author: Matthew Wilcox
reviews.summary: Matthew Wilcox questioned the correctness of returning the zone number of the head page in page_zonenum() and suggested that the caller might be interested in the zone number of the current page, not the head page.
